hero.description: A comprehensive assessment platform designed by Tenadam Training, Consultancy & Research PLC to help organizations assess culture, performance, and excellence. Powered by proven frameworks including OCAI and Baldrige.

multiUser.title: Multi-User Access
multiUser.description: System administrators, facilitators, and employees - each with tailored access and permissions.

orgManagement.title: Organization Management
orgManagement.description: Create and manage multiple organizations with custom branding and assessment access.

secureKeys.title: Secure Access Keys
secureKeys.description: Generate unique access codes for employees to participate in assessments anonymously and securely.

analytics.title: Real-Time Analytics
analytics.description: Track participation, view aggregate results, and gain insights with comprehensive reporting tools.

ocai.title: OCAI Assessment
ocai.description: Measure organizational culture across 6 dimensions using the proven Competing Values Framework.

baldrige.title: Baldrige Excellence
baldrige.description: Evaluate organizational performance against the Malcolm Baldrige National Quality Award criteria.

step1.title: Sign In
step1.description: Administrators and facilitators sign in with credentials. Employees use secure access keys.

step2.title: Take Assessment
step2.description: Choose from available assessments (OCAI, Baldrige) and complete them at your own pace.

step3.title: View Results
step3.description: Access comprehensive reports, aggregate data, and actionable insights for your organization.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Organization?
cta.description: Join organizations worldwide using Tenadam's assessment platform to drive meaningful change and organizational excellence.
